name: Amaranto

files.patch: N/A:Please select the patch archive from http://www.mediafire.com/file/3y43ndykjtlm65m/trial_english.zip

content:
exe: onscripter-en
files:
- demo: http://trial.dlsite.com/doujin/RJ046000/RJ045681_trial.zip
- patch: N/A:Please select the patch archive from http://www.mediafire.com/file/3y43ndykjtlm65m/trial_english.zip
- ons: N/A:Please select the Onscripter archive
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: $demo
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: $patch
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: $ons
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/onscripter-en
